example.text: It was their equipment. It was their machinery.

Ok, now that I’ve got your attention…… overclassification is a serious issue. This week, I introduced two comprehensive bipartisan bills to address it. It’s time to improve public trust by making smarter decisions around classification.

I’m glad to see the Dept of Education begin the process to implement the law that I championed to provide relief for borrowers trapped in consolidated student loans. There is still much more work to be done, and I will continue to push for the full implementation!

Picture this: even if every document the government classified in one year was only one page thick, they would reach more than halfway to the altitude that airplanes fly at. That’s a real issue, so I’m leading bills to change it! [[url]]

I’m also concerned about ensuring that Sudanese nationals living here in the US would not be forced to return to Sudan amid this violence. This is why [[user]] and I have urged for a new TPS designation for Sudan. [[url]]

Picture this: even if every document the government classified in one year was only one page thick, they would reach more than halfway to the altitude that airplanes fly at. That’s a real issue, so I’m leading bills to change it! [[url]]
